submission.title: Navigator User Interfaces (NUI) as a Coordination Layer for a Post-Search, Post-Feed Web
submission.overview: This submission introduces Navigator User Interfaces (NUIs) as a new standard for customizable, shareable navigation tools across web-based tasks, educational flows, and collaborative work. NUIs propose a federated ecosystem of navigation frameworks allowing pluralistic learning, interaction, and AI-guided exploration, grounded in a shared regular panel. This enables remixable workflows while supporting agency, privacy, transparency, and ethical alignment. This submission was generated with protocol META-DP-EVAL-v1.3.
submission.raw_content: [Full original submission text, as provided, is preserved here.]

directly_addressed_dps.summary: Standard hooks for federated trust, attribution, and user-linked navigation components.
User-created paths and tools empower navigational authorship and customization.
Privacy protections and user-controlled sharing in collaborative navigation flows.
Decentralized IDs and tags for posts, paths, and navigation objects.
Cross-platform plug-in model for browser or overlay-based NUI modules.
Remixable meta-environment for shared pedagogy, research, and workflow design.
Structured learning flows, feedback loops, and teaching tools embedded in NUI design.
AI agents within NUI paths are visible, reviewable, and governed through feedback.
Formalized participatory control over AI agent behavior in shared workflows.
Versioning, edit history, and transparent navigator behaviors build trust.
Path usage and adoption informs reputation of components and contributors.
NUIs act as community-authored infrastructure supporting participatory design.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Navigator Preference and Trust Hook Integration
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Support shared user-linked metadata across NUIs for reputation, settings, and context continuity.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Enables personalized yet portable experiences across community tools and teams.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Path Authorship and Remixing as User Empowerment
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Users should be able to author and fork navigational flows with fine-grained control.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Gives agency over how tools are used, shared, and adapted.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Private and Granular Visibility of Navigational Artifacts
clarifications_and_extensions.clarification: Clarify mechanisms for selectively sharing, subscribing, or encrypting shared paths and posts.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Protects user context while enabling collaborative utility.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Interoperable Navigation Identifiers
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Define a decentralized naming system for posts, paths, and navigator components.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Enables search, recomposition, and reuse without central indexing.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Pluggable Navigator Layers
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Support light-touch modular implementation that overlays on existing apps.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Avoids heavy platform coupling, encourages adoption.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Live Learning Flows and Adaptive Guidance
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Support NUI-based pedagogy through real-time feedback, question paths, and comprehension scaffolds.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Supports asynchronous and distributed learning communities.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Versioning and Edit Trails in Navigational Layers
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Track and display modifications to shared paths and flows.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Supports epistemic integrity and collaborative governance.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Usage-informed Curation Metrics
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Log and surface usage metrics for navigators to inform remix and signal trust.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Allows bottom-up reputation and preference emergence.

clarifications_and_extensions.title: Community-maintained Navigational Infrastructure
clarifications_and_extensions.extension: Design NUIs as co-owned scaffolding tools that grow with community needs.
clarifications_and_extensions.why_it_matters: Shifts UI control from platforms to people.
